name: list_album_tracks
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: Fetches a list of tracks for a given album from the Spotify API, with optional pagination support.

albumid.description: The unique identifier for the album.

limit.description: The maximum number of tracks to return per request. Defaults to None.

offset.description: The number of tracks to skip before starting to collect the result set. Defaults to None.
